1.1.name: wordpress/myscoop-rank-display
1.1.description: This plugin connects directly to myScoop and pulls information regarding your blog. The information is then stored in a data file on your server and only updated once a day to ensure quick loading times. You can now display either a graph of your rank history, or a big rank button.
